title: 通知 通知 《澳綠黨敦促政府為在澳香港人提供人道保護》

replies.msg: Green 置於塔斯Tasmania 的辦事處給予港人設立 連儂牆

人地出到聲，我地要讓海外港人的聲音傳入議會
https://twitter.com/Greens/status/1169035778690707456?s=19

plz like and share

#FREEHONGKONG INCREASED THREATS & WHAT YOU CAN DO

I have over the past two days had phone calls, emails & met with very distressed & upset people originally from Kong Kong or have loved ones still in Hong Kong. They have expressed deep sadness of what is happening to their original home - Hong Kong, and the repression being spread by the Beijing Government through Hong Kong Administration.

They have shown me images/videos and messages from loved ones and friends still in Hong Kong - many of which just want freedom and peace.

I am shocked & dismayed on the weakness of the Australian Government & Prime Minister in not standing up to China and giving a stern warning 'enough is enough'. I am also shocked but not surprised that the United Nations has not even made statements of condemnation [Another reason why Australia should Exit UN].

Like many of you who have commented on my page or contacted me, I am one voice, but I shall try to assist where I legally can. However, in this great Country of ours, I urge you to exercise your voice and democracy & contact your Local Federal Member & the Prime Minister expressing your deep concerns of the safety and welfare of the People in Hong Kong. 'Two wrongs don't make a right' - and we can NOT allow the tragedy to escalate in Hong Kong like we saw in 1989!

Will the Prime Minister Scott Morrison (ScoMo) follow the footsteps of the Late Bob Hawke, and when the time comes offer 'Protection to Residents of Hong Hong'?......too much anguish and pain has already been felt, the People of Hong Kong just want what we have - Peace, Freedom & Democracy.

The Contact Link for Federal Local Members is - https://www.aph.gov.au/senators_and_members/members [Each Federal Member will have their Email address contained in their link]

Prime Minister
Mr Scott Morrison MP
Email: scott.morrison.mp@aph.gov.au
Phone: (02) 6277 7700
Fax: (02) 6273 4100

"I support the people of Hong Kong - let Peace prevail".

#FreeKongKong #HongKongProtestors #CCP #China #GayeCameronNSW #OneNation #Democracy #Peace #ExitUN

* Written & Authorised by Gaye Cameron.
